dataList.content:
During the event period, deploying the following Identities on your team will
boost the amount of <color=#ffa7a7>[Intro to Zhi, Yong, Ren]</color> earned.
You can earn a maximum of <color=#ffa7a7>120%</color> boost to the amount of event currency earned.

Durante l'evento, puoi ottenere delle <color=#ffa7a7>[Introduzione allo Zhi, Yong, Ren]</color> dopo aver completato le Sezioni Evento. You can also obtain <color=#ffa7a7>[Intro to Zhi, Yong, Ren]</color> by clearing Main Story Stages for the first time, by clearing the Mirror Dungeon, or by clearing Achievements.

Rarely, you may obtain <color=#ffa7a7>[Definitely Not A Secret Scroll]</color> from clearing Event Stages, Main Story Stages, or Mirror Dungeons,
and <color=#ffa7a7>[Definitely Not A Secret Scroll]</color> is automatically converted to 20 <color=#ffa7a7>[Intro to Zhi, Yong, Ren]</color> upon acquisition.

In the <color=#ffa7a7>[Reward Exchange]</color> window, you can purchase various rewards by spending <color=#ffa7a7>[Intro to Zhi, Yong, Ren]</color> you have collected.

Earn <color=#ffa7a7>[Intro to Zhi, Yong, Ren]</color> via the following methods:
Event Stage & Dungeon clears, Mirror Dungeon clears,
Achievement clears, and Main Story Stage & Dungeon first-time clears.

In the <color=#ffa7a7>[Reward Exchange]</color> window, you can purchase various rewards
by spending <color=#ffa7a7>[Intro to Zhi, Yong, Ren]</color> you have collected.

Complete various Achievements via classes to obtain <color=#ffa7a7>[Intro to Zhi, Yong, Ren]</color>.

Once the event period is over, you will no longer be able to complete the Achievements. However, the rewards will still remain claimable.

Tornare in classe
e ricominciare a studiare?
Non è ancora ora di fare lezione.

La Lezione non è ancora terminata.
Se vuoi seguire nuovamente la lezione, entra nella Sezione 8.5-4.
